snippet.title: Z Buster official trailer
snippet.description:
iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/app/id1126269043
Android: https://goo.gl/Z1aNg1

Polish your guns, grenades and dancing shoes as the wackiest zombies are on us!

KEY FEATURES
* Gorgeous cartoon visuals
* Magnificently animated characters
* Smooth and addictive gameplay
* Great weapons of choice
* Simple and intuitive upgrade system
* Full retina display support
* Game Center support

Platform: iOS / Android
Twitter: http://twitter.com/istomgames
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/IstomGames
isTom Games: http://www.istomgames.com
